title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the appropriate negative control is to measure the reaction rate (at the varying substrate concentrations) without any enzyme present.
The response indicates that the appropriate negative control is to measure the reaction rate (at the varying substrate concentrations) without any enzyme present.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
